comments.content_dir: Default content directory to load on startup
comments.diffusion_patterns: Path to LED diffusion patterns file (.npz)
comments.timing_log: Path to CSV file for frame timing data logging
comments.batch_mode: Enable batch processing (8 frames at once) for improved performance
comments.position_shifting: Enable audio-reactive LED position shifting effects
comments.max_shift_distance: Maximum LED positions to shift on beats
comments.shift_direction: Position shift direction: left, right, or alternating
comments.adaptive_dropping: Enable adaptive frame dropping for LED buffer management
comments.audio_device: Audio device index or name for beat detection (null for default)
